issue.title: Exceptions no longer print file:line from where they were thrown

content.raw:
Sorry for the delayed response. I just tested your commit by running the `UNIT_Exception_TEST` and it looks like it has correctly added the file and line number.

I ran the test from the build folder with: `./gazebo/common/UNIT_Exception_TEST`

Please feel free to submit a pull request. Thanks!
